Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Ramada Encore Leicester, you'll be centrally located in Leicester, steps from Curve Theatre and minutes from Leicester Town Hall. This hotel is within close proximity of Haymarket Shopping Centre and Athena Conference Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 115 guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Ramada Encore Leicester, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour front desk, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Ramada Encore Leicester, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 115 guestrooms. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access is available. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (complimentary).

With a stay at Ramada Encore Leicester, you'll be centrally located in Leicester, steps from Curve Theatre and minutes from Leicester Town Hall. This hotel is within close proximity of Haymarket Shopping Centre and Athena Conference Centre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Curve Theatre - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Leicester Town Hall - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Haymarket Shopping Centre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Athena Conference Centre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Highcross Shopping Centre - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Leicester Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Phoenix Arts Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
New Walk Museum - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Jewry Wall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
De Montfort University - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
University of Leicester - 1 km / 0.6 mi
De Montford Hall - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Walkers Stadium - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
National Space Centre - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Grace Road - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for Ramada Encore Leicester is East Midlands (EMA) - 25.2 km / 15.7 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
